biography: Joni, a familiar name from the Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his calm demeanor and strategic play on the course. While some might consider him reserved, those who know him well appreciate his dry wit and unwavering dedication to the sport.

Joni has participated in the Hector Trophée once, with one memorable victory to his name. Although he is now considered retired from Hector Trophée events, his impact on the tournament is undeniable. While he never secured the Victor Trophy, his contributions as a team player are fondly remembered.

Currently, Joni is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025. However, golf enthusiasts know that last-minute changes are always a possibility, and the prospect of seeing Joni back on the course is certainly intriguing.
